text: Piṟaku, ivarkaḷ (ekiptukku vantu) yūsuḥpiṭam ceṉṟu avarai nōkki (‘‘misriṉ atipatiyākiya) ajīsē! Eṅkaḷaiyum eṅkaḷ kuṭumpattaiyum (pañcattiṉ) koṭumai piṭittuk koṇṭatu. (Eṅkaḷiṭamirunta) oru aṟpapporuḷaiyē nāṅkaḷ koṇṭu vantirukkiṟōm. (Ataik kavaṉiyātu) eṅkaḷukku vēṇṭiya tāṉiyattai muḻumaiyāka aḷantu koṭuttu mēṟkoṇṭum eṅkaḷukkut tāṉamākavum koṭuttaruḷvīrāka! Niccayamāka allāh tāṉam ceypavarkaḷukku nalla piratipalaṉ aḷippāṉ'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉārkaḷ
